Summary: Two paths of light with 2 seconds producing a hum noise apart were seen in the sky
divs: Sighting Details At about 2045 hrs from a Local Restaurant with see view as I was waiting for my food I was filming the lighting and the storm in the ocean coming far south of Puerto Vallarta when I saw two paths of light "not like" a lighting with 2 seconds apart each crossing the sky producing a hum noise from north to south in a ascending direction about 5 miles away the beach in Puerto Vallarta.
